page.title: 04Farming cont.
page.content: The crop which has greatly increased in recent years is Oil Seed Rape. (easily recognised by its bright yellow flowers in early summer). Only one farm in the area tends to be different from the general pattern of crop production - Mr.S.Johnson's farm at Plawsworth. He farms 240 acres. There are no animals but in addition to the usual crops he has recently introduced soft fruit (Strawberries,Raspberries and Gooseberries) with great success. The Johnston family have farmed here for 170 years.
